item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 7:50, so let's meet outside in front of the theater at 7:20. After the movie we'll head to Friday's.

Please keep your RSVP up-to-date. And call me with any last-minute RSVPs, for directions, or to tell me you're running late.

Hope to see you tomorrow for Couple's Retreat!

--Dana
508/308-4897

OLD STUFF:
The amazing ensemble cast of Couple's Retreat (Vince Vaughn, Jason Bateman, Jon Favreau, Kristin Davis, Kristen Bell) is sure to bring a smile to my face. Wanna come along?

SUMMARY:
Four Midwestern couples embark on a journey to a tropical island resort. While one of the couples is there to work on their marriage, the other three set out to jet ski, spa and enjoy some fun in the sun. They soon discover that participation in the resort's couples therapy is not optional. Suddenly, their group-rate vacation comes at a price. What follows is a hilarious look at real world problems faced by all couples.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet outside the theater doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Fridays (I'll bring the coupons!) to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update the time a few days before the meetup, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for Couple's Retreat!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: Couple's Retreat
